LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays a toast within a flow.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: The title of the toast that will be displayed in larger font.

property.name: message
property.label: Message Text
property.description: The message that will be displayed underneath the title. Use {0} once as a placeholder for the urlLabel.

property.name: urlLabel
property.label: Message Url Label
property.description: The label of a hyperlink to the recordId that can be displayed with the placeholder {0}.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: Possible values: error, success, info, warning.

property.name: mode
property.label: Mode
property.description: Possible values: 1. dismissible - default, remains visible until either close button clicked or 3 seconds pass. 2. pester - persists for 3 seconds and disappears automatically, no close button. 3. sticky - visible until close button clicked.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Object Record Id
property.description: If specified, a link to this record will be part of the toast.

property.name: triggerNavigationNextEvent
property.label: Triggers Next Navigation
property.description: Will trigger next/finish on the flow screen after the toast.
